FlowGraph

Class ShapeDto

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.Dtos
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Legacy data transfer object for Shape serialization (Version 1 format). Maintained for backward compatibility when deserializing old files. Supports polymorphic shape types (rectangle, line, text, ellipse).
